parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which you want to move the resource. For more information about resource groups, see the "Resource Group" section of the [What is Resource Management?](~~94475~~) topic.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the resource.\
You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~131035~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   stack: stack
*   stackgroup: stack group
*   template: template
